00102 static void skipuntil( istream& is, const string& token )
00103 {
00104     if( token.length( ) == 0 )
00105         {
00106         return;
00107         }
00108 
00109     char   c;
00110     string cmp;
00111 
00112     //
00113     // read first chunk of characters
00114     //
00115     while( cmp.length( ) < token.length( ) && is && ! is.eof( ) )
00116         {
00117         is.get( c );
00118                 cmp += c;
00119     }
00120 
00121     //
00122     // loop until token found
00123     //
00124     while( ! ( cmp == token ) && is && ! is.eof( ) )
00125         {
00126         is.get( c );
00127                 cmp.erase( 0, 1 );
00128                 cmp += c;
00129     }
00130 }

00174 static void nexttoken( istream& is, string& token,
00175                        const list< string >& tokenlist,
00176                        const string& ignore = " \t\r\n\v\f" )
00177 {
00178     char c;          // the current character
00179     bool sign;       // +/-
00180     bool point;      // decimal point
00181     bool digit;      // digit greater than zero
00182     bool exp;        // exponential part, introduced by "e" after the decimal 
00183                      // point
00184     bool expsign;    // sign in the exponential part
00185     bool expdigit;   // digit in the exponential part
00186     bool number;     // digit greater than zero/+/-/decimal point
00187 
00188     // Skip leading "ignore" characters:
00189     while( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00190         is.get( c );
00191         if( ignore.find( c ) == string::npos ) break;
00192     }
00193 
00194     if( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00195         token    = c;
00196         sign     = c == '-' || c == '+';
00197         point    = c == '.';
00198         digit    = isdigit( c ) != 0;
00199         number   = digit || sign || point;
00200         exp      = false;
00201         expsign  = false;
00202         expdigit = false;
00203 
00204         // Get next character:
00205         while( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00206             is.get( c );
00207 
00208             // End of number reached?
00209             if( number ) {
00210                 if( ! isdigit( c ) &&
00211                     c != '.' &&
00212                     c != '-' &&
00213                     c != '+' &&
00214                     c != 'e' &&
00215                     c != 'E' ) {
00216                     if( digit )
00217                         break;
00218                     else
00219                         number = false;
00220                 }
00221             }
00222 
00223             // End of number reached?
00224             if( number ) {
00225                 if( ( c == '.' && point ) ||
00226                     ( ( c == 'e' || c == 'E' ) && exp ) ||
00227                     ( ( c == '-' || c == '+' ) &&
00228                       ( ! exp || expsign || expdigit ) ) ) {
00229                     if( digit )
00230                         break;
00231                     else
00232                         number = false;
00233                 }
00234             }
00235 
00236             // Check for exponential part of number:
00237             if( number ) {
00238                 digit    |= ! exp && isdigit( c );
00239                 exp      |= c == 'e' || c == 'E';
00240                 expsign  |= exp && ( c == '-' || c == '+' );
00241                 expdigit |= exp && isdigit( c );
00242             } else {
00243                 if( count( tokenlist.begin( ), tokenlist.end( ), token ) > 0 )
00244                     break;
00245             }
00246 
00247             token += c;
00248         }
00249 
00250         is.putback( c );
00251     }
00252 }

00255 //===================================================================
00438 int readArray( Array< double >& arr, istream& is, bool seek,
00439                const string beginRecord,
00440                const string endRecord,
00441                const string beginComment,
00442                const string endComment,
00443                const string separator,
00444                const vector< unsigned > dimensions )
00445 {
00446 #ifdef _WIN32
00447     const double NotANumber  = numeric_limits< double >::quiet_NaN( );
00448     const double Infinity    = numeric_limits< double >::infinity( );
00449     const double NegInfinity = -Infinity;
00450 #elif __SUNOS__
00451     const double NotANumber  = sqrt( -1. );
00452     const double Infinity    = 1. / 0.;
00453     const double NegInfinity = -1. / 0.;
00454 #else
00455         // <awd, 2000-03-13> assume ix86 architecture where HUGE_VAL is
00456         // +infinity (thus, getting rid of annoying warnings about
00457         // division by zero)
00458     const double NotANumber  = sqrt( -1. );
00459     const double Infinity    = HUGE_VAL;
00460     const double NegInfinity = -HUGE_VAL;
00461 #endif
00462 
00463     string token;
00464     string ignore;
00465     string delim;
00466     list< string > tokens;
00467 
00468     //=======================================================================
00469     //
00470     // token must not contain white space characters
00471     //
00472     if( beginRecord .find( ' ' ) != string::npos ||
00473         endRecord   .find( ' ' ) != string::npos ||
00474         beginComment.find( ' ' ) != string::npos ||
00475         endComment  .find( ' ' ) != string::npos ) {
00476         cerr << "record and comment tokens must not contain white space chars\n";
00477         return -2;
00478     }
00479 
00480     //=======================================================================
00481     //
00482     // if no dimensions are defined we need at least the end of record token
00483     //
00484     if( dimensions.size( ) == 0 && endRecord.length( ) == 0 ) {
00485         cerr << "end of record token is empty\n";
00486         return -2;
00487     }
00488 
00489     //=======================================================================
00490     //
00491     // if begin of comment is defined we need the end of comment token
00492     //
00493     if( beginComment.length( ) > 0 && endComment.length( ) == 0 ) {
00494         cerr << "end of comment token is empty\n";
00495         return -2;
00496     }
00497 
00498     //=======================================================================
00499     //
00500     // ignore the following characters
00501     // only if they don't occur in any token)
00502     // (except end of token which is handled separately)
00503     //
00504     ignore = ' ';
00505     token = beginRecord + endRecord + beginComment + separator;
00506     if( token.find( '\t' ) == string::npos ) ignore += '\t';
00507     if( token.find( '\r' ) == string::npos ) ignore += '\r';
00508     if( token.find( '\n' ) == string::npos ) ignore += '\n';
00509     if( token.find( '\v' ) == string::npos ) ignore += '\v';
00510     if( token.find( '\f' ) == string::npos ) ignore += '\f';
00511 
00512     //=======================================================================
00513     //
00514     // build list of used tokens (leave end of comment token out)
00515     //
00516     if( beginRecord .length( ) > 0 ) tokens.push_back( beginRecord  );
00517     if( endRecord   .length( ) > 0 ) tokens.push_back( endRecord    );
00518     if( beginComment.length( ) > 0 ) tokens.push_back( beginComment );
00519     for( unsigned i = 0; i < separator.size( ); i++ )
00520         if( separator[ i ] != ' ' )
00521             tokens.push_back( string( 1, separator[ i ] ) );
00522 
00523     //=======================================================================
00524     //
00525     // add special tokens for NaN and Inf
00526     //
00527     if( count( tokens.begin( ), tokens.end( ), "NaN" ) +
00528         count( tokens.begin( ), tokens.end( ), "Inf" ) +
00529         count( tokens.begin( ), tokens.end( ), "+Inf" ) +
00530         count( tokens.begin( ), tokens.end( ), "-Inf" ) > 0 ) {
00531         cerr << "tokens 'NaN' and 'Inf' are not allowed\n";
00532         return -2;
00533     }
00534     tokens.push_back( "NaN" );
00535     tokens.push_back( "Inf" );
00536     tokens.push_back( "+Inf" );
00537     tokens.push_back( "-Inf" );
00538 
00539     //=======================================================================
00540     //
00541     // if seeking is allowed read the first line of the stream
00542     //
00543     if( seek ) {
00544         char prefix[100];
00545         streampos pos = is.tellg( );
00546         is.getline( prefix, sizeof( prefix ) );
00547         token = (string) prefix;
00548         is.seekg( pos, ios::beg );
00549     } else
00550         token = "";
00551 
00552     //=======================================================================
00553     //
00554     // formatted input ? line begins with "Array< T >( ... )"
00555     //
00556     if( token.find( "Array<" ) == 0 ) {
00557       is >> arr;
00558     }
00559     //=======================================================================
00560     //
00561     // dimension vector defined ?
00562     //
00563     else if( dimensions.size( ) > 0 ) {
00564         //===================================================================
00565         //
00566         // dimension totally fixed (0 serves as wildcard)
00567         //
00568         if( dimensions[ 0 ] > 0 ) {
00569             arr.resize( dimensions );
00570 
00571             for( unsigned i = 0;
00572                  i < arr.nelem( ) && is.good( ) && ! is.eof( );
00573                  ++i ) {
00574                 //
00575                 // dimensions are fixed now,
00576                 // ignore all begin/end of record and separator tokens
00577                 //
00578                 do {
00579                     nexttoken( is, token, tokens, ignore );
00580 
00581                     //
00582                     // comment found ?
00583                     //
00584                     if( token == beginComment ) {
00585                         skipuntil( is, endComment );
00586                         continue;
00587                     }
00588                 } while( ( token == beginRecord || token == endRecord ||
00589                            separator.find( token ) != string::npos ) &&
00590                          is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) );
00591 
00592                 //
00593                 // handle 'not a number's and infinite values
00594                 //
00595                 if( token == "NaN" )
00596                     arr.elem( i ) = NotANumber;
00597                 else if( token == "Inf" || token == "+Inf" )
00598                     arr.elem( i ) = Infinity;
00599                 else if( token == "-Inf" )
00600                     arr.elem( i ) = NegInfinity;
00601                 else
00602                     arr.elem( i ) = atof( token.c_str( ) );
00603             }
00604         }
00605         //===================================================================
00606         //
00607         // dimension only partially fixed (dimension 0 undefined)
00608         //
00609         else {
00610             unsigned i, lastdim;
00611             list< double > value;
00612             list< double >::iterator li;
00613             vector< unsigned > dim;
00614 
00615             while( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00616                 //
00617                 // ignore all begin/end of record and separator tokens
00618                 //
00619                 do {
00620                     nexttoken( is, token, tokens, ignore );
00621 
00622                     //
00623                     // comment found ?
00624                     //
00625                     if( token == beginComment ) {
00626                         skipuntil( is, endComment );
00627                         continue;
00628                     }
00629                 } while( ( token == beginRecord || token == endRecord ||
00630                            separator.find( token ) != string::npos ) &&
00631                          is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) );
00632 
00633                 if( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00634                     //
00635                     // handle 'not a number's and infinite values
00636                     //
00637                     if( token == "NaN" )
00638                         value.push_back( NotANumber );
00639                     else if( token == "Inf" || token == "+Inf" )
00640                         value.push_back( Infinity );
00641                     else if( token == "-Inf" )
00642                         value.push_back( NegInfinity );
00643                     else
00644                         value.push_back( atof( token.c_str( ) ) );
00645                 }
00646             }
00647 
00648             lastdim = value.size( );
00649             for( i = 1; i < dimensions.size( ); ++i )
00650                 lastdim /= dimensions[ i ];
00651 
00652             dim = dimensions;
00653             dim[ 0 ] = lastdim;
00654 
00655             //
00656             // copy found values to the Array
00657             //
00658             arr.resize( dim );
00659             for( i = 0, li = value.begin( );
00660                  i < arr.nelem( ) && li != value.end( );
00661                  ++i, ++li )
00662                 arr.elem( i ) = *li;
00663         }
00664     }
00665     //=======================================================================
00666     //
00667     // else unformatted input
00668     //
00669     else {
00670         bool lastsep;
00671         bool expectval;
00672         bool blanksep;
00673         unsigned i, depth, end, lastdim;
00674         double missing = HUGE_VAL;
00675         list< double > value;
00676         list< double >::iterator li;
00677         vector< unsigned > dim;
00678         // contains the number of values per dimension:
00679         vector< unsigned > stack;
00680 
00681         lastsep   = true;
00682         blanksep  = separator.length( ) == 0 ||
00683                     separator.find( ' ' ) != string::npos;
00684         expectval = blanksep || beginRecord.length( ) == 0;
00685         // no. of begin records that were not ended yet:
00686         depth     = 0; 
00687         // end of stack:
00688         end       = 0;
00689         stack.push_back( 0 );
00690 
00691         while( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00692             nexttoken( is, token, tokens, ignore );
00693 
00694             //
00695             // comment found ?
00696             //
00697             if( token == beginComment ) {
00698                 skipuntil( is, endComment );
00699                 continue;
00700             }
00701 
00702             if( is.good( ) && ! is.eof( ) ) {
00703                 // begin of new record
00704                 if( beginRecord.length( ) > 0 && token == beginRecord ) {
00705                     depth++;
00706                     lastsep = expectval = true;
00707                 // end of current record
00708                 } else if( token == endRecord ) {
00709                     if( lastsep && stack[ 0 ] > 0 ) {
00710                         value.push_back( missing );
00711                         stack[ end = 0 ]++;
00712                     }
00713                     lastsep = false;
00714                     if( beginRecord.length( ) > 0 ) {
00715                         // end of record with missing begin of record?
00716                         if( depth == 0 ) {
00717                             cerr << "unbalanced end of record token\n";
00718                             return -1;
00719                         }
00720                         // end of current record
00721                         depth--;
00722                     }
00723                     // new dimension found?
00724                     if( end >= dim.size( ) )
00725                         dim.push_back( stack[ end ] );
00726                     else {
00727                         if( stack[ end ] != dim[ end ] ) {
00728                             cerr << "dimensions do not match\n";
00729                             return -1;
00730                         }
00731                     }
00732                     stack[ end++ ] = 0;
00733                     if( end >= stack.size( ) )
00734                         stack.push_back( 0 );
00735                     stack[ end ]++;
00736                     expectval = blanksep;
00737                 // separator found
00738                 } else if( separator.find( token ) != string::npos ) {
00739                     if( lastsep ) {
00740                         value.push_back( missing );
00741                         stack[ end = 0 ]++;
00742                     }
00743                     lastsep = expectval = true;
00744                 // array value
00745                 } else {
00746                     if( ! expectval ) {
00747                         cerr << "unexpected value\n";
00748                         return -1;
00749                     }
00750 
00751                     //
00752                     // handle 'not a number's and infinite values
00753                     //
00754                     if( token == "NaN" )
00755                         value.push_back( NotANumber );
00756                     else if( token == "Inf" || token == "+Inf" )
00757                         value.push_back( Infinity );
00758                     else if( token == "-Inf" )
00759                         value.push_back( NegInfinity );
00760                     else
00761                         value.push_back( atof( token.c_str( ) ) );
00762 
00763                     stack[ end = 0 ]++;
00764                     lastsep = false;
00765                     expectval = blanksep;
00766                 }
00767             }
00768         }
00769 
00770         //
00771         // append missing sizes
00772         //
00773         if( stack.size( ) > dim.size( ) )
00774             dim.insert( dim.end( ),
00775                         stack.begin( ) + dim.size( ),
00776                         stack.end( ) );
00777 
00778         //
00779         // check if dimensions are consistent
00780         //
00781         if( beginRecord.length( ) > 0 && depth > 0 ) {
00782             cerr << "missing end of record token\n";
00783             return -1;
00784         }
00785         lastdim = value.size( );
00786         for( i = 0; i < dim.size( ) - 1; ++i )
00787             lastdim /= dim[ i ];
00788 
00789         if( dim[ dim.size( ) - 1 ] != lastdim ) {
00790             //
00791             // if end of record token is newline append missing dimensions
00792             // silently
00793             //
00794             if( endRecord == "\n" )
00795                 dim[ dim.size( ) - 1 ] = lastdim;
00796             else {
00797                 cerr << "missing end of record token\n";
00798                 return -1;
00799             }
00800         }
00801 
00802         //
00803         // copy found values to the Array
00804         //
00805         reverse( dim.begin( ), dim.end( ) );
00806         arr.resize( dim );
00807         if( value.size( ) != arr.nelem( ) ) {
00808             cerr << "Array dimensions are corrupted\n";
00809             return -1;
00810         }
00811         for( i = 0, li = value.begin( ); li != value.end( ); ++i, ++li )
00812             arr.elem( i ) = *li;
00813     }
00814     //=======================================================================
00815 
00816     if( ! is.eof( ) && ! is.good( ) ) {
00817         cerr << "invalid stream operation\n";
00818         return -1;
00819     }
00820 
00821     return 0;
00822 }
